pkgmetadata.longdescription: ========================Scipion xmipptomo plugin========================.. image:: https://github.com/I2PC/scipion-em-xmipptomo/blob/devel/xmipptomo/xmipp_logo.png :width: 300This is a xmipptomo plugin for **scipion**=====Setup=====- **Install this plugin in devel mode:**Using the command line:.. code-block:: git clone git@github.com:I2PC/scipion-em-xmipptomo.git cd xmipptomo scipion installp -p local/path/to/scipion-em-xmipptomo --devel
